  • Deprecated Fields

  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI
    Use WOWZCodecUtils instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZMediaConfig.CROP_TO_FRAME 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.ENCODER_INFO
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.getCodecInfo() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZMediaConfig.FILL_FRAME 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WOWZBroadcast.LOG_WOWZ_MESSAGES
    Use WOWZBroadcast.setLogLevel(int) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.OPENGLES_INFO
    Use WOWZGLES.getEglInfo(boolean) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics.WOWZBitmap.SURFACE_HEIGHT
    Use WOWZBitmap.FRAME_HEIGHT instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics.WOWZBitmap.SURFACE_WIDTH
    Use WOWZBitmap.FRAME_WIDTH instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.checkEglError(String)
    Use WOWZGLES.checkForEglError(String) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.createEglSurface(EGLDisplay, EGLSurface, Surface) 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.endStreaming()
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.endStreaming(WOWZBroadcastStatusCallback)
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getAudioDevice()
    Create a WOWZAudioDevice instance to use with WOWZBroadcastConfig.setAudioBroadcaster(WOWZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster).
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getAvailableDeviceCameras(Context)
    Use WOWZCamera.getAvailableDeviceCameras(Context ctx) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.getBaseSurfaceSize() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getBroadcaster()
    The WOWZCameraView class now implements the WOWZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster interface so you can use a WOWZCameraView instance directly in WOWZBroadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(WOWZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster), for example, broadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(cameraView);.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WOWZBroadcast.getBroadcastStatus()
    Use WOWZBroadcast.getStatus() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getCameraInfo(Context)
    Use WOWZCamera.getCameraInfo(Context ctx) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getCameraView()
    Create a WOWZCameraView instance in your application layout or construct one dynamically to use with WOWZBroadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(WOWZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster).
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getConfig()
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getDefaultAudioDevice()
    Create a WOWZAudioDevice instance to use with WOWZBroadcastConfig.setAudioBroadcaster(WOWZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster).
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getDefaultBroadcastConfig()
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getDeviceCameras(Context)
    Use WOWZCamera.getDeviceCameras(Context ctx) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getDeviceOrientation()
    Use WOWZDeviceUtils.getDeviceOrientation(Context) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.getEglBaseSurface() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WOWZPlatformInfo.getEglInfo()
    Use WOWZGLES.getEglInfo(boolean) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.getEglInfo()
    Use WOWZGLES.getEglInfo(boolean) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WOWZPlatformInfo.getEncoderInfo()
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.getCodecInfo() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI.getEncodersForType(String)
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.getEncodersForType(String) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZMediaConfig.getLabel(boolean, boolean, boolean) 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZStreamConfig.getLogLevel()
    Use WZBroadcast#getLogLevel() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.getNativeSurface() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getNumberOfDeviceCameras(Context)
    Use WOWZCamera.getNumberOfDeviceCameras(Context ctx) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI.getProfileLevels()
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.getProfileLevels() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI.getProfiles()
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.getProfiles() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getStatus()
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session and retrieve its status using WOWZBroadcast.getStatus().
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.getStatus()
    Use WOWZCameraView.getPreviewStatus() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WOWZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster.getStatus()
    Use WOWZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster.getBroadcasterStatus() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZDeviceUtils.getSurfaceRotation(Context)
    Use WOWZDeviceUtils.getDeviceRotation(Context) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.getTextureId()
    Do not use EglEnv to track texture IDs.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.hasPermission(Context, String)
    Due to the wide variation in the Android permission model introduced with Marshmallow, you should handle permissions directly in your native application code.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.hasPermissions(Context, String[])
    Due to the wide variation in the Android permission model introduced with Marshmallow, you should handle permissions directly in your native application code.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.isMuted()
    Create a WOWZAudioDevice instance to control audio input devices.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.isPaused()
    Use WOWZCameraView.isPreviewPaused() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.player.WOWZPlayerView.isPlaying()
    use status object for state/status reference.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.isStreaming()
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.muteAudio()
    Create a WOWZAudioDevice instance to control audio input devices.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZMediaConfig.orientationToSurfaceRotation(int)
    Use WOWZMediaConfig.orientationToRotation(int) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI.ProfileLevelToWZProfileLevel(MediaCodecInfo.CodecProfileLevel)
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.ProfileLevelToWZProfileLevel(MediaCodecInfo.CodecProfileLevel) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setCameraView(WOWZCameraView)
    Use a WOWZCameraView instance created in your application layout or constructed dynamically to display and control the camera preview.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WowzaConfig)
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WowzaConfig, boolean)
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WOWZMediaConfig)
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WOWZMediaConfig, boolean)
    Create a WOWZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WOWZBroadcast instance.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZStreamConfig.setLogLevel(int)
    Use WZBroadcast#setLogLevel(int) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.setNativeSurface(Surface)
    Use WOWZGLES.EglEnv.generateEglWindowSurface(java.lang.Object) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WOWZCameraView.setPreviewReadyListener(WOWZCameraView.PreviewStatusListener)
    Use WOWZCameraView.setPreviewStatusListener(PreviewStatusListener) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WOWZGLES.EglEnv.setTextureId(int)
    Do not use EglEnv to track texture IDs.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startCameraPreview()
    Use WOWZCameraView.startPreview() instead.

    Use WOWZCameraView.startPreview() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WowzaConfig, WOWZBroadcastStatusCallback)
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WOWZBroadcastStatusCallback)
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WOWZMediaConfig, WOWZBroadcastStatusCallback)
    Create a WOWZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.stopCameraPreview()
    Use WOWZCameraView.stopPreview() instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WOWZMediaConfig.surfaceRotationToOrientation(int)
    Use WOWZMediaConfig.rotationToOrientation(int) instead.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.unmuteAudio()
    Create a WOWZAudioDevice instance to control audio input devices.
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.encoder.WOWZEncoderAPI.WZProfileLevelToProfileLevel(WOWZProfileLevel)
    Use WOWZCodecUtils.WZProfileLevelToProfileLevel(WOWZProfileLevel) instead.
